type IConventionNavigationBase = interface interface INavigationBase interface IPropertyBase interface IAnnotatable interface IConventionPropertyBase interface IConventionAnnotatable

summary.para: Represents a navigation property which can be used to navigate a relationship.
This interface is used during model creation and allows the metadata to be modified. Once the model is built, represents a read-only view of the same metadata.
